solution_line_template: Last year's winner walked {last_year_winner_miles} miles because {last_year_winner_collected_money} / {last_year_earnings_per_mile} = <<{last_year_winner_collected_money}/{last_year_earnings_per_mile}={last_year_winner_miles}>>{last_year_winner_miles}

Elroy has to walk {elroy_miles} miles to collect ${elroy_target_collection} because {elroy_target_collection} / {elroy_earnings_per_mile} = <<{elroy_target_collection}/{elroy_earnings_per_mile}={elroy_miles}>>{elroy_miles}
Elroy will walk {extra_miles_elroy_walks} more miles because {elroy_miles} - {last_year_winner_miles} = <<{elroy_miles}-{last_year_winner_miles}={extra_miles_elroy_walks}>>{extra_miles_elroy_walks}
